title: Skillsoft to Showcase Latest Product Innovations at 18th Annual HR Technology Conference
text:
Company to Show Live Demonstrations of Latest Talent Expansion® Suite; Customer Capgemini to Present on How it is Improving and Expanding Learning and Talent Management Across the Entire Organization
NASHUA, N.H.
Skillsoft , a global leader in learning and talent management, today announced that it will unveil its latest innovations, designed to enable self-developing organizations, next week at the HR Technology Conference and Exposition in Las Vegas, NV. During the conference, Skillsoft will show how its technology is helping customers transform organizational performance and build high-impact cultures by delivering personalized, continuous development, when and where employees need it most.
Conference attendees are invited to experience live demonstrations of Skillsoft’s product innovations on Monday, Oct. 19 and Tuesday, Oct. 20 at the company’s Innovation Theater in booth #1500 in the exposition hall. The following sessions will highlight key aspects of the talent development journey, from the employee, manager and organization perspective:
Enabling the Self-Developing Organization
Monday, Oct. 19 – 10:15 a.m. to 10:45 a.m.
Tuesday, Oct. 20 – 10:15 a.m. to 10:45 a.m.
Learn about Skillsoft’s latest Talent Expansion® suite enhancements, including an expanded talent profile that connects people to the activities and insights they need in order to get better at their jobs and advance in their careers; personalized learning recommendations embedded throughout talent processes; and an actionable view of capability gaps in the context of an employee’s current role and career progression.
Creating a Continuous and Adaptive Learning Culture
Monday, Oct. 19 – 2:45 p.m. to 3:15 p.m.
Tuesday, Oct. 20 – 1 p.m. to 1:30 p.m.
Learn how Skillsoft’s latest Talent Expansion platform helps organizations create adaptive learning plans for employees. See how Skillsoft’s enterprise search capabilities can pinpoint relevant resources.
Delivering a Personalized Development Experience
Monday, Oct. 19 – 4:15 p.m. to 4:45 p.m.
Tuesday, Oct. 20 – 3:15 p.m. to 3:45 p.m.
Learn how to configure dashboards, apply corporate themes and branding and create individualized employee landing pages.
At the conference, attendees can hear firsthand how Skillsoft is working with its customer Capgemini, a Paris-based global consulting, technology and outsourcing firm, to deliver a modern, scalable, world-class learning and development experience across the company’s 180,000 employees in 40 countries.
On Monday from 11 a.m. to 12 p.m. in room Surf D-F, Debbie Collins, Director of MyLearning and University Information Systems for Capgemini, and Humair Ghauri, SumTotal’s Senior Vice President of Products and Technology, will discuss how Capgemini is scaling and standardizing its talent and learning processes globally and will share the vision of its cutting-edge development program.
Skillsoft executives and product experts will discuss how the company is enabling self-developing organizations, mapping potential to performance, with its full spectrum of talent, workforce, payroll and analytics solutions throughout the conference at booth #1500 in the exposition hall.

About Skillsoft
Skillsoft is a pioneer in the fields of learning and talent management with a long history of innovation. Skillsoft provides cloud-based learning solutions for its customers worldwide, ranging from global enterprises, government, and education to mid-sized and small businesses. Skillsoft's customer support teams draw on a wealth of in-house experience, flexible delivery platforms and a comprehensive learning e-library to develop off-the-shelf and custom learning programs tailored to cost-effectively meet customer needs. Skillsoft's courses, books and videos have been developed by industry leading learning experts to ensure that they maximize business skills, performance, and talent development.
Skillsoft currently serves over 6,700 customers and more than 45 million learners around the world. Skillsoft is on the web at http://www.Skillsoft.com .
